original_text: Then Laban and Bethuel answered and said, “The thing has come from the Lord; we cannot speak to you bad or good.
korean_text: 라반과 브두엘이 대답하여 이르되 이 일이 여호와께로 말미암았으니 우리는 가부를 말할 수 없노라

sentences.original_text: Then Laban and Bethuel answered and said,
The thing has come from the Lord;
we cannot speak to you bad or good.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 당신에게 좋은지 나쁜지 말할 수 없노라.
